object_remover.page_title: AI Object Remover — Remove Logos & Watermarks
object_remover.page_desc: Remove unwanted objects, logos, and watermarks from photos with AI. Brush over any area and let AI fill it in seamlessly. Free to use.
object_remover.title: AI Object Remover
object_remover.subtitle: Upload a photo, brush over what you want removed, and let AI fill it in cleanly. Great for logos, watermarks, and distracting objects.
object_remover.upload_hint: Drag & drop an image or click to browse (JPG, PNG — max 10MB)
object_remover.upload_invalid: Please upload a valid image file (JPG, PNG, WebP).
object_remover.draw_hint: Paint over the object you want to remove, then click Remove.
object_remover.error_generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
object_remover.tip_1: Paint generously — cover the whole object including its shadow and edges. The AI uses surrounding pixels to fill the gap.
object_remover.tip_2: Works best on uniform or repeating backgrounds like sky, walls, or grass. Complex scenes may need a second pass.
object_remover.tip_3: For small logos, zoom in and use a small brush. For large areas, use a large brush and make sure every pixel is covered.

td_generator.page_desc: Generate SEO-optimized YouTube titles and descriptions with AI. Upload thumbnails for visual context. Free to use.
td_generator.title: YouTube TD Generator
td_generator.subtitle: Generate click-worthy, SEO-optimized titles and descriptions for your YouTube videos. Provide reference content, describe your needs, and optionally upload an image for context.
td_generator.reference_hint: Paste existing titles and descriptions you want to use as style reference.
td_generator.reference_placeholder:
Title: How I Made $10K with Faceless YouTube
Description: In this video, I share my exact strategy...

(Paste one or more reference TDs here)
td_generator.requirement_hint: Describe what you want: rewrite, new topic, highlight specific keywords, change tone, etc.
td_generator.requirement_placeholder: e.g., Generate a similar title and description but focus on AI voiceover tools. Target keyword: best AI voice generator for YouTube
td_generator.image_drop_hint: Drag & drop a thumbnail or screenshot, or click to browse
td_generator.image_too_large: Image must be under 1MB. Please compress or resize it.
td_generator.invalid_image: Please upload a valid image file (JPG, PNG, WebP).
td_generator.tip_1: Be specific in your requirement. Instead of "make it better", say "rewrite to emphasize the keyword 'AI voice generator' and use a curiosity hook in the title".
td_generator.tip_2: Provide 2-3 reference TDs from top-performing videos in your niche. The AI will learn the style and structure.
td_generator.tip_3: Upload your actual thumbnail — the AI analyzes the visual content and creates a title/description that matches what viewers will see.
td_generator.tip_4: Include your target language in the requirement if you want non-English output. e.g., "Generate in Japanese" or "Generate in Spanish".

yt_translator.page_desc: Translate your YouTube video titles and descriptions to multiple languages with AI. Reach a global audience effortlessly.
yt_translator.title: YouTube TD Translator
yt_translator.subtitle: Translate your YouTube video titles and descriptions to reach a global audience. Connect your YouTube account, select videos, choose a target language, and let AI handle the rest.
yt_translator.login_desc: Sign in with your Google account to load your videos. We only request access to read and update your video metadata.
yt_translator.no_videos: No videos found in your channel.
yt_translator.batch_write_desc: {count} translations ready. Write all to YouTube at once?
yt_translator.step_1: Sign in with your YouTube/Google account. We securely access your video list through YouTube's official API.
yt_translator.step_2: Select the videos you want to translate and pick your target language. Our AI translates titles and descriptions while keeping SEO keywords intact.
yt_translator.step_3: Review the translations, then write them back to YouTube as localized metadata with one click. Your videos are now discoverable in new markets!
yt_translator.disclosure: This tool uses the YouTube Data API and Google Gemini AI. Your data is processed securely and never stored on our servers.

yt_thumbnail.page_desc: Download YouTube video thumbnails in HD, SD, and all resolutions. Paste any YouTube URL and save thumbnails for free.
yt_thumbnail.title: YouTube Thumbnail Downloader
yt_thumbnail.subtitle: Paste any YouTube video URL to instantly preview and download thumbnails in all available resolutions.
yt_thumbnail.invalid_url: Please enter a valid YouTube video URL.
yt_thumbnail.tip_1: HD (1280×720) thumbnails may not exist for older or low-quality videos. If it doesn't appear, use HQ (480×360) instead.
yt_thumbnail.tip_2: Thumbnails are great for creating channel art, blog post images, or designing your own custom thumbnails using a reference.
yt_thumbnail.tip_3: Supports all YouTube URL formats: standard watch links, short youtu.be links, Shorts, and embed URLs.

common.not_found_desc: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
